name: Blaite
description:
A platform game so difficult and at the same time, so addictive that you will enjoy having to repeat a levels dozens of times until complete them, enjoy this platform game with your friends and challenge them.

Features:
  • You will receive up to 5 new levels each week.
  • Hours of fun and anger, all at once in a "good" way.
  • Great for playing with your friends and laughing with them or... of them.
